rows.label: qst201604_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, Nanakoori-san! Welcome,
mo! Everything is ready, mo!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0002
rows.name:
Come, come, first, please come
here and sign the contract, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0003
rows.name: Could we be being deceived...?

rows.label: qst201604_msg0004
rows.name:
Hana also thinks this is suspicious,
mo. It smells fishy, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0005
rows.name:
It's probably fine. Nanakoori
finally got motivated, after all.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0006
rows.name:
This might be a chance
for Nanakoori to change.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0007
rows.name: Let's all support her.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0008
rows.name:
If anything happens, we can
just deal with it ourselves.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0009
rows.name: Alright! The contract is signed, mo!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0010
rows.name:
Then, let's start with
the basic lessons, mo!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0011
rows.name:
Nanakoori-san, I'm going to be
strict, so please keep up, mo!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0012
rows.name: Y-Yes!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0013
rows.name:
First and foremost, you
need a captivating voice...
the power of Vocals, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0014
rows.name:
Next, you also need the power
of a look that makes everyone
turn their heads, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0015
rows.name:
Finally, you also need Soul
to avoid getting nervous
in front of people, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0016
rows.name: We will train these three skills, mo!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0017
rows.name: I-I understand.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0018
rows.name:
For now, let's say Nanakoori-san's
current status is level 1
in everything, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0019
rows.name: That's low...

rows.label: qst201604_msg0020
rows.name:
By the way, compared to
Nanakoori-san, Nia-san has
Vocals -5, Looks -2, and Soul 5, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0021
rows.name: Hey!

rows.label: qst201604_msg0022
rows.name:
Just kidding, mo. First, let's
raise all skills to level 2, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0023
rows.name:
When you want to know your level,
please talk to Teetapz, mo.

rows.label: qst201604_msg0024
rows.name: Now, let's lesson, mo!
